articles.author: Cheng Leng, Owen Walker
articles.title: Chinese lenders extend billions of dollars to Russian banks after western sanctions - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing has pushed renminbi as alternative global currency to dollar
articles.content:
Chinese lenders stepped in to extend billions of dollars to Russian banks as western institutions pulled back their operations in the country during the first year of Moscows invasion of Ukraine.
